name: M.E.R.G
description:
You are a tree, a mechanically enhanced and diesel fueled tree. Dig your roots deep.

Avoid radioactive waste, mole mafia, underpaid ants and rocks.

CONTROLS:
Steer left/right: Left/Right Arrows or A/D keys.

KNOWN ISSUES:
Some pickups disappear at the 2300m mark, making reaching the ending at 5000m difficult

Created for the University of Gloucestershire participation in the Global Games Jam 2023

Created by:

  • Charles Carter - Programming
  • Daniel Crawford - Illustration
  • Kai Ismay - 3D Art/Sound
  • Matthew Mason - Programming
